txt.en: 'Why if I'd known that village was full of bugan, I would never have thought to make a peace offering! We've had such troubles with them that I find it an affront that they should dwell so near!\n\n'This means a blood-feud, [placeholder]! I have a new message for ye to send them: get out of this land! Return to Khoblún Utot and drive them out!'
'That should show them! Ye have our thanks, [placeholder]. It's only too bad that ye couldn't clear the lot of them out.'
'The accursed bugan want blood...we will give them plenty!'
After learning that the 'hobbits' of the neighbouring village were actually a breed of wild goblin called the bugan, Mayor Brochtû declared a blood feud against them.
Khoblún Utot lies to the south of Maur Tulhau.\n\nIolo Brochtû has asked you to return to Khoblún Utot and drive out the bugan.
Talk to Iolo Brochtû at Maur Tulhau
Iolo Brochtû is at Maur Tulhau, north of Khoblún Utot.\n\nYou should return to Iolo Brochtû with news of your success.
